titleStmt.title: A letter to his highness the Lord Protector from Captain Unton Crooke, signifying the totall defeat of the Cavaliers in the west, under the command of Sir Joseph Wagstaffe. Published by his highness special commandment.
titleStmt.author: Croke, Unton.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field, printers to his highness,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
